level.heading: Conditions present at time of sentencing excluded.
level.text: No physical or medical condition set forth in ยง 24-461 which existed at the time of sentencing shall provide the basis for geriatric or medical parole under this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-271
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-271, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 24-461.
